channel.title: SetItem Command
channel.description: Can someone provide the command my server doesn't have the ::setitem command can someone provide the code for me?

item.title: SetItem Command
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Halflingblade:

that doesn’t really work. because if they were on moparscape client and they used ::setitem on a different server. Then logged out of that server and went on mine the item would still be the same, then enabling them to smith that item. I’m trying to fix the smithing dupe

Can’t believe I didn’t think of that.
Make the server check that the player has an item before they try to do anything with it.

Read full topic

item.title: SetItem Command
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Halflingblade:

oh… well actually I was looking for it so I could find a way to disable the code. Players can cheat on my server and I need to disable setitem somehow.

Just ban their IP if they try to use it.

if(command.toLowerCase().startsWith("setitem"))
{
    appendToBannedIP();
}

Or whatever you use to write their name to the IP banned file.

Read full topic
